attributes.action: Raise awareness for mental health and support students and teachers
attributes.additional_details:
A nationwide wide campaign, focusing on the different aspects of mental health showing the nation it isn't something to be afraid of. Teachers and students can get support from their peers, schools and hospitals.

Having  mental disorders such as depression and anxiety is very common especially in such a social surrounding. It can have an affect on one' behaviour and productivity.

Sign this e-petition to show your support and bring schools to teach more about mental health in PSHE lessons and hire councillors for every school.
